Image.Alt: A crowd of people walking towards the Vietnam Veterans Memorial Wall.
Image.Caption: Scouts visiting the Vietnam Veterans Memorial Wall.

Image.Alt: A man in a white Troop 53 class B tee-shirt facing the camera smiling. In the background, scouts sit looking at waterfalls.
Image.Caption: Assistant Scoutmaster, Kevin Shaw, smiling for the camera while scouts take a break at the FDR Memorial.

Image.Alt: Photo of the Lincoln Memorial from the outside. Scouts are halfway up walking towards the enterance.
Image.Caption: Scouts visiting the Lincoln Memorial.

Image.Alt: Photo of the Jefferson Memorial. A group of scouts are walking up the stairs.
Image.Caption: Scouts walking up the stairs of the Jefferson Memorial.

Image.Alt: Two scouts taking a drink from water fountains.
Image.Caption: Taking a water break.

Image.Alt: Photo of the US capital, with two scouts in class A uniforms walking towards the stairs.
Four scouts standing with the Washington Monument in the background. The three to the right are wearing Class A uniforms, the scout on the left is wearing a red Class B.
Image.Caption: Scouts in front of the reflecting pool.

Image.Alt: Five scouts sitting in front of a water fall fountain.
Image.Caption: Scouts take a break at the FDR Memorial.
